french: On appelle tout couple \( (G,\star) \) où \(G\) est un ensemble et \(\star\) est une loi de composition interne telle que :
• La loi est associative : \( \forall (x,y,z)\in G^3,\; x\star y\times z = (x\star y)\star z = x \star (y\star z)\) ;
• Il existe un élément \(e\) appelé élément neutre de \(G\) tel que : \( \forall x \in G, \; x\star e = e \star x = x \) ;
• Pour tout élément \(x\), il existe un élément \(y\), dit symétrique de \(x\), tel que : \( x\star y = y \star x = e \).
Si, de plus, la loi \(\star\) est commutative, on dit que \( (G,\star) \) est un groupe commutatif ou un groupe abélien.
english: We call any couple \( (G,\star) \) where \(G\) is a set and \(\star\) is a binary operator such that:
• The operator is associative: \( \forall (x,y,z)\in G^3,\; x\star y\times z = (x\star y)\star z = x \star (y\star z)\) ;
• There exist an element \(e\) called neutral element of \(G\) such that: \( \forall x \in G, \; x\star e = e \star x = x \) ;
• For any \(x\), there exist \(y\), called the symmetric of \(x\), such that: \( x\star y = y \star x = e \).
If, on top of that, the operator \(\star\) is commutative, then \( (G,\star) \) is a commutative group, or an abelian group.
